medical_history.chief_complaint: Periumbilical/epigastric abdominal pain migrating to the right lower quadrant (RLQ).
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began one day prior to presentation, with pain starting at 5:00 AM and worsening in severity, described as band-like and burning. No association with eating noted. Last bowel movement was in the morning at 8:00 AM.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. Sleep apnea 2. C-section, years prior 3. Kidney stone at prior age 4. Tubal ligation, years ago 5. Left-sided back pain following epidural.
medical_history.family_history: Father with kidney cancer status post resection, years ago; mother deceased due to myocardial infarction, also had diabetes mellitus.
